docs.snippet: Packaged foods maker Hormel Foods Corp said on Tuesday that it had suspended operations at one its pork suppliers in Oklahoma until it investigates claims that pigs were being abused at the farm....
docs.lead_paragraph: Packaged foods maker Hormel Foods Corp said on Tuesday that it had suspended operations at one its pork suppliers in Oklahoma until it investigates claims that pigs were being abused at the farm.

headline.main: Hormel Stops Operations at Supplier Farm After Video Shows Animal Abuse
headline.print_headline: Hormel Stops Operations at Supplier Farm After Video Shows Animal Abuse

docs.snippet: U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres said on Wednesday that U.S. President Donald Trump's travel restrictions on people with passports from seven countries and a freeze on refugee resettlement was "not the best way to protect the U.S." and shou...
docs.lead_paragraph: U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres said on Wednesday that U.S. President Donald Trump's travel restrictions on people with passports from seven countries and a freeze on refugee resettlement was "not the best way to protect the U.S." and should be lifted sooner than later.

headline.main: U.N. Chief Says Trump Travel Ban 'Not Best Way to Protect U.S.'
headline.print_headline: U.N. Chief Says Trump Travel Ban 'Not Best Way to Protect U.S.'

docs.snippet: U.N. human rights experts warned that asylum seekers could face torture if not given safe harbor and the Vatican called for  openness to other cultures on Wednesday, adding to a drumbeat of international criticism of U.S. President Donald Trump's ...
docs.lead_paragraph: U.N. human rights experts warned that asylum seekers could face torture if not given safe harbor and the Vatican called for  openness to other cultures on Wednesday, adding to a drumbeat of international criticism of U.S. President Donald Trump's travel curbs.

headline.main: Concerned About Refugees, U.N. Experts Add to Censure of Trump Move
headline.print_headline: Concerned About Refugees, U.N. Experts Add to Censure of Trump Move

docs.snippet: Tagimoucia, a crimson and white flower, grows mainly on a single mountain ridge in Fiji. It has a magical significance to Fijians....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tagimoucia, a crimson and white flower, grows mainly on a single mountain ridge in Fiji. It has a magical significance to Fijians.

headline.main: A Rare Pacific Islander Captivates Its Neighborhood
headline.print_headline: Seeking a Celebrity Among Fiji’s Floral Bounty

docs.snippet: Former Mercedes Formula One technical head Paddy Lowe is set to become a shareholder in the Williams team when he joins after a period of 'gardening leave', British media reported on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Mercedes Formula One technical head Paddy Lowe is set to become a shareholder in the Williams team when he joins after a period of 'gardening leave', British media reported on Wednesday.

headline.main: Motor Racing: Lowe Set to Become Williams F1 Shareholder-Reports
headline.print_headline: Motor Racing: Lowe Set to Become Williams F1 Shareholder-Reports

docs.snippet: A Zimbabwean pastor, accused last year of trying to overthrow President Robert Mugabe's government after calling for protests, was arrested at the airport when he flew home from the United States on Wednesday, his lawyer said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Zimbabwean pastor, accused last year of trying to overthrow President Robert Mugabe's government after calling for protests, was arrested at the airport when he flew home from the United States on Wednesday, his lawyer said.

headline.main: Protest Pastor Arrested on Return to Zimbabwe From U.S.
headline.print_headline: Protest Pastor Arrested on Return to Zimbabwe From U.S.

docs.snippet: A federal judge in Los Angeles has ordered the U.S. government to allow people holding immigrant visas from seven majority-Muslim nations into the United States despite President Trump's executive order banning them....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Los Angeles has ordered the U.S. government to allow people holding immigrant visas from seven majority-Muslim nations into the United States despite President Trump's executive order banning them.

headline.main: Judge Orders Halt to Trump's Ban for Immigrant Visa Holders
headline.print_headline: Judge Orders Halt to Trump's Ban for Immigrant Visa Holders

docs.snippet: The Zimbabwe pastor who fled to the United States after launching the popular #ThisFlag protest movement has been arrested on his return home, his lawyer said Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Zimbabwe pastor who fled to the United States after launching the popular #ThisFlag protest movement has been arrested on his return home, his lawyer said Wednesday.

headline.main: Zimbabwe Pastor Who Led Protests Is Arrested on Return Home
headline.print_headline: Zimbabwe Pastor Who Led Protests Is Arrested on Return Home

docs.snippet: Leicester City forward Leonardo Ulloa will remain "professional" despite failing to get a move from the Premier League champions in the January transfer window, he told Sky Sports on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Leicester City forward Leonardo Ulloa will remain "professional" despite failing to get a move from the Premier League champions in the January transfer window, he told Sky Sports on Wednesday.

headline.main: Leicester's Ulloa Won't Strike After Failing to Leave
headline.print_headline: Leicester's Ulloa Won't Strike After Failing to Leave
